page.title: 18INTERESTING BUILDINGS 1/2
page.content:
There are few notable buildings. Three 17th century buildings are at "Taphouse"(the"new"Tedburn St Mary) on the main road:
{North Venimiles}- map reference 813942 Two story cob building with thatched roof. Very attractive. This building may be much older, possibly of Saxon origin.
{Great Uppacott}- map reference 814939 Two storey cob building with thatched roof. Three casement windows. Small cob tiled wing to S.W. end. also cob barns.
{Hores Uppacott}- map reference 814938 Two storey long, low cob building with thatched roof. Barn extention to S.W. External chimney on N.E. front with oven bulge beside it.
